verses.verse: O Lord, our Lord, how wonderful is thy name in all the earth! for thy magnificence is exalted above the heavens.
(Mat 21:16. ) Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou perfected praise, because of thine enemies; that thou mightest put down the enemy and avenger.
For I will regard the heavens, the work of thy fingers; the moon and stars, which thou hast established.
(Heb 2:6 - 9. ) What is man, that thou art mindful of him? or the son of man, that thou visitest him?
Thou madest him a little less than angels, thou hast crowned him with glory and honour;
and thou hast set him over the works of thy hands: thou hast put all things under his feet:
sheep and all (Gr. cows. ) oxen, yea and the cattle of the field;
the birds of the sky, and the fish of the sea, the creatures passing through the paths of the sea.
O Lord our Lord, how wonderful is thy name in all the earth!
